Class ItemHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • rocky.teatime.widgets.ItemHolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class ItemHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
    Again much of the code for this comes from understanding the Timber music player project.
